This value set includes codes based on the following rules:

  • Include these codes as defined in http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/EVS/Thesaurus.owl
    CodeDisplay
    C15417Randomized Clinical Trial
    C93043Nonrandomized Clinical Trial
  • Include codes from http://ncicb.nci.nih.gov/xml/owl/EVS/Thesaurus.owl where concept descends from C25196
